page.title: 18Gt.Alne School uniform
page.content: Great Alne J&I School boys uniform in the winter is black trousers,a grey or white shirt,a tie and grey socks.The girls winter uniform is a grey or white shirt,a tie and maroon tights or white socks.The boys summer uniform is a grey pair of shorts and a white T_shirt.The girls sumer uniform is a blue and white checked dress and ankle socks.The P.E. kit for the boys is maroon shorts and a white T_Shirt. The girls P.E. kit is Maroon knickers and a white T_shirt with pumps or trainers.For the Arden Area sports (in which most schools participate)The kit for that is a blue T_shirt with the schools' name and badge on it and your Maroon knickers or shorts.
